name: Apocalyptic Decisions
description:
A text-adventure apocalyptic survival game. 

What type of survivor are you? 

Will you sacrifice your teammates to save yourself, or make the ultimate sacrifice? 

How will you stay alive? 

You and your teammates are in the lobby of an uncleared compound filled with the infected along every route to the safe zone. The goal? Clear the compound with everyone alive, especially you, on the other side of that door.  But some complications arise along the way, and you are faced with literal life and death decisions. How will you choose to survive? 

...Can you survive? 

(We recommend playing in the dark theme for this game. To change the theme, press the "theme" button in the upper left corner of the game screen.)
